summary: In this sprint planning discussion, the architect clarified assumptions that user stories US-010 (Mock Login), US-015 (Add Employee Profile), and US-001 (Employee Directory Search) were already implemented based on prior context, forming a foundational loop for the employee directory. If not done, the architect proposed prioritizing them in SP-001 for a minimal viable sprint before proceeding to enhancements.

actions.task: Provide actual status of US-010, US-015, and US-001 to allow recalibration of sprint proposal

backlog_deltas.title: Prioritize US-010, US-015, and US-001 as foundation if not already done

risks.risk: Misalignment on status of foundational user stories leading to incorrect sprint planning
risks.mitigation: Clarify and confirm actual implementation status before finalizing sprint priorities
